45 struct Observer {
46  // Members
47  int observer_id;
48  void * AK_observer_type;
49 
50  // Methods

54 };

62 struct Observable {
63  // Members
64  AK_observer *observers[MAX_OBSERVABLE_OBSERVERS];
65  int observer_id_counter;
66  void * AK_observable_type;
67  int AK_ObservableType_Def;
68 
69  // Methods
70  int (*AK_destroy_observable) (struct Observable*);
71  int (*AK_register_observer) (struct Observable*, AK_observer*);
72  int (*AK_unregister_observer) (struct Observable*, AK_observer*);
73  int (*AK_notify_observer) (struct Observable*, AK_observer*);

75  int (*AK_run_custom_action) (void*);
76  AK_observer* (*AK_get_observer_by_id) (struct Observable*, int id);
77 };
78 typedef struct Observable AK_observable;
